amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase from 3 to 6 the number of Appalachian States eligible to receive grants under the Abandoned Mine Reclamation Fund.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase from 3 to 7 the number of Appalachian States eligible to receive grants under the Abandoned Mine Reclamation Fund.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Griffith amendment (A017) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A017) offered by Mr. Griffith.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Griffith amendment (A017) Failed by voice vote.
